channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Instagram Analyst
item.description: Belajar menganalisis data likes instagram kita agar menemukan hit like terbanyak pada postingan kita. Di era sekarang ini, Artificial Intelligence lagi hot hotnya nih, banyak cabang Ilmu dari AI seperti Mechine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP (Natural Language Processing) dan lain-lain yang berbondong bondong di pelajari oleh orang-orang di karenakan karir nya yang cukup menjanjikan. Salah satu skill set yang di butuhkan sebelum meloncat kepada bidang AI ialah Data Analyst dan Data Scientst.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo
item.description: Thumbnails can be enabled easily by setting the thumbnail parameter in the frontmatter to an image such as "images/landscape.jpg". Make sure to copy the image the static/images/ directory. If put together, it will look like this (that’s in fact this post’s frontmatter): +++ author = "Hugo Authors" title = "Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo" date = "2019-03-04" description = "Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo" tags = [ "thumbnail", ] thumbnail= "images/landscape.

item.title: About
item.description: Saya Hafif Nur Muhammad seorang Full Stack Developer. kemampuan saya pada Front-End meliputi HTML,CSS ,Vanila JavaScript,Vue,Angular,React,Ember dan Svelte. Sedangkan di bagian Back-End saya menguasai PHP,Java,Python,NodeJS,Golang,Ruby dan C#. Hobby saya menulis, terkadang juga di sela-sela waktu saya bermain CTF, Competitive Programming ataupun Contest IT lainnya. Beberapa Kemampuan Tambahan saya: Docker Kubernetes Jenkins Vulnerability Assessment / IT Sec Message Broker (Kafka / RabbitMq) Data Analyst UI / UX Design Ketahui lebih lanjut tentang saya di GitHub.
